page.title: 09SHAPINSAY FIRE SERVICE
page.content: The{fire service}was started 12 years ago by local people who were worried about fires on the island.Eight local people are part time{firemen}.The {service}has been used five times.On only one occasion was there a serious} fire. Mainly they are called to chimney fires. If there was a very {serious fire}a{brigade}from Kirkwall would be called out but it has not been necessary yet.The men do get special training twice a year.They have to run and do special exercises {Water}to put out the fires comes from {hydrants,ponds}or even the{sea.}They have special equipment.It is a small {portable fire engine}which is put on the lorry.Their{uniforms}are{oilskins and{rubber boots.
